page.syntax: Time_Equivalent as C = CTIME(timeval as t )

argument.name: Time_Equivalent
argument.description: A character string representation of a time value that can be sorted. The format is YYYMMDDhhmmssP

argument.name: timeval
argument.description: A time value. For example: 02/15/2006 09:27:16 91 am

page.description: Converts a time value into a string. Format is YYYYMMDD0h0m0s3.
page.discussion: The CTIME() function converts a time value into a character value that can be used in a sort expression.
